## Workflow.addInputTable() method

Add a named input

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  table | TableContainer |  |
|  id | string | <i>(Optional)</i> the input name to bind this table to (default will be the table id) |
